title: PM Shehbaz Sharif to leave for Saudi Arabia on Saturday: Tarar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 05 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar has confirmed that Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif will leave for Saudi Arabia on Saturday (tomorrow).
The minister, in a statement issued on Friday, said this would be the first foreign visit of the prime minister since his election to the PMâ€™s office on March 4.
Tarar said the prime minister would use a commercial flight for the purpose. The prime minister and members of his delegation would bear their travel expenses, the minister added.
